author: SciShow
description:
There's a complex, mysterious current running throughout the Atlantic Ocean, and it's in trouble. But to help save it, researchers need to understand it, and finding ways to study it has been a challenge. But it turns out that the secret to studying and someday saving the AMOC might be.... clams.

Hosted by: Savannah Geary (they/them)

title: These Clams Could Predict The Future
